channel.title: Bird's Eye View of Reproducibility
channel.description: Recent content on Bird's Eye View of Reproducibility

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Part 1 - Introduction Intro: Me and Computational Reproducibility. 20 min (slides) Breakout Discussion 1 15 min Go to notes here Introduce yourself: Name, Career Stage, why you came today Assign a note taker Q1: If you were asked to make your project 100% computational reproducible, what specific challenges would you face? Group Insights 3-5 min each group Part 2 - Principles of Work flow Design Principles of Work flow Design 25 min (slides) Breakout Discussion 2 15 min Go to notes here Assign a note taker Q2: Describe your research team (career stages, comp.
